Title: Relates to technological improvements to the statewide central register
Summary: Improves child welfare investigations by improving the central register; requires calls made to the central register be recorded and such recording made part of any report of suspected child abuse or neglect.
LawCode: Amd ยง422, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to technological improvements to the central register
